titleStmt.title: The Benjamin's lamentation for their sad loss at sea by storms and tempests being a brief narrative of one of his Majesty's ships, call'd, the Benjamin, that was drove into harbour at Plimouth, and received no small harm by this tempest. To a new tune, call'd, The poor Benjamin, O, &c.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by and for W. D. and sold by the booksellers,

notesStmt.note: Wing CD-ROM, 1996 gives range of dates: 1695-1700. Publication date from Wing CD-ROM, 1996.
Wing suggests publisher's name as W. O[nley].
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
